form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Form N-648, Medical Certification for Disability Exceptions, Department of Homeland Security U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services

full_text: Screened by NARA, 4/24/2023 OMB No. 1615-0060; Expires 10/31/10 Department of Homeland Security Form N-648, Medical Certification for U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services Disability Exceptions ATTENTION: ALL parts of this form (except for the "APPLICANT ATTESTATION" below) must be completed by a licensed medical doctor, licensed doctor of osteopathy, or licensed clinical psychologist. However, a supplemental report is not acceptable as a substitute for any of the responses.
